authors.name: John Doe
authors.AboutAuthor: Tech enthusiast, software engineer, and avid blogger. Passionate about AI, web development, and the future of technology.
authors.About: Jane Doe is a seasoned software engineer with over a decade of experience in web development. She specializes in JavaScript, React, and Node.js, and has a keen interest in emerging technologies like AI and blockchain. Jane is a frequent speaker at tech conferences and contributes to various open-source projects.
